repnme.cdata!:
Mexico - Earthquake Rehabilitation and
            Reconstruction Project

abstracts.cdata!:
This project aims to assist the
            Government in the rehabilitation and reconstruction of the
            urban centers damaged by the earthquake of September 19,
            1985.  Furthermore, it intends to improve construction
            standards and planning through regulatory instruments at the
            municipal, state and national levels to protect urban
            infrastructure and superstructure from future earthquake
            tremors.  To accomplish these objectives, the project
            comprises:  (a) housing rehabilitation and reconstruction;
            (b) community facilities; (c) demolition and removal of
            debris in the metropolitan area of Mexico City; and (d)
            institutional support.

docna.cdata!:
Mexico - Earthquake Rehabilitation and
            Reconstruction Project
